name: Ground Turkey Stroganoff
author: Brandy
summary: Easy to make, fast ground turkey stroganoff recipe for cold nights.
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup with roasted garlic
directions: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rapid boil
Cook egg noodles at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 9 minutes
Meanwhile, heat butter in a large saucepan or deep skillet over medium heat
Saute mushrooms, onion, and garlic until soft, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir in ground turkey and cook until browned and no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes more
Stir in flour, salt, and pepper; cook for 5 minutes
Stir in soup, milk, and water
Bring to a simmer and cook, uncovered, for 10 minutes
Add sour cream and stir until heated through
